Here's what some of our students and staff had to say

  • “Since I’ve been attending Spark, I feel less anxious and a little more confident with my education.”

    - Young Person, age 15

  • “Spark works hard to build trust with students and break down any barriers to learning. They have made excellent progress with a very challenging individual in a short amount of time and work relentlessly to give the student the necessary strategies to return back to mainstream school. They do this through an individualised project plan which still comprising of all national curriculum areas to reduce the loss in learning from school. I would highly recommend this provision.”

    - Assistant Headteacher and Key Stage 3 Leader Mainstream Secondary School

  • “I would definitely recommend Spark, it’s easy to get to and it has made me feel really good about myself. I’m a hands-on learner and they make sure that I am not bored, but I’m still learning. Since I’ve been attending Spark, I feel less anxious and a little more confident with my education.”

    - Young Person, age 15

  • “The Spark team bring energy, reliability and an undeniable commitment to providing high quality support to children and young people. Working alongside them is always great fun!”

    - Billie James, Youth Work Manager, The Way Youth Zone
